Animals.name: Calico Cat
Animals.moves: Scratch, Pounce, Charm, Quick Dash, Night Vision, Playful Swipe
Animals.description: A nimble and curious companion, the domestic cat uses its sharp senses to detect threats and hidden resources. Though small, it’s agile, stealthy, and fiercely protective when cornered.

Animals.name: Beagle Hound
Animals.moves: Bite, Quick Dash, Howl, Sniff Out, Pounce, Agility Strike
Animals.description: A loyal and protective companion, the domestic dog excels at guarding and tracking with its keen senses. Strong and courageous, it thrives in a pack and will defend its allies without hesitation.

Animals.name: Rhesus Monkey
Animals.moves: Scratch, Bite, Quick Dash, Agile Leap, Taunt, Coconut Throw
Animals.description: Highly social and clever, the rhesus monkey thrives in urban pockets where it scavenges and adapts to human presence. Agile and mischievous, it can overwhelm foes with teamwork and resourcefulness.

Animals.name: Tokay Gecko
Animals.moves: Bite, Tail Whip, Quick Dash, Camouflage, Loud Call, Ambush Strike
Animals.description: A brightly colored gecko known for its loud calls, the tokay lizard clings to walls and ceilings with ease. Fierce for its size, it defends itself with a powerful bite and startling agility.

Animals.name: Jungle Cat
Animals.moves: Pounce, Scratch, Quick Dash, Ambush, Agile Leap, Hunting Claw
Animals.description: A secretive wild feline that haunts the outskirts of cities, the jungle cat relies on stealth and speed to hunt. Its sharp senses and agility make it a formidable predator, even in urban fringes.

Animals.name: Secretary Bird
Animals.moves: Peck, Leg Strike, Quick Dash, Stomp, High Jump, Sky Scan
Animals.description: The secretary bird is a tall, long-legged bird of prey native to sub-Saharan Africa, known for hunting snakes on foot. Its striking appearance includes an eagle-like body atop crane-like legs, topped with long black crest feathers.

Animals.name: Bombay Cat
Animals.moves: Scratch, Pounce, Night Stalk, Hypnotic Gaze, Quick Dash, Shadow Swipe
Animals.description: A nimble and curious companion, the domestic cat uses its sharp senses to detect threats and hidden resources. Though small, it’s agile, stealthy, and fiercely protective when cornered.

Animals.name: Tabby Cat
Animals.moves: Scratch, Pounce, Tail Whip, Quick Dash, Agile Leap, Hiss
Animals.description: A nimble and curious companion, the domestic cat uses its sharp senses to detect threats and hidden resources. Though small, it’s agile, stealthy, and fiercely protective when cornered.

Animals.name: Tuxedo Cat
Animals.moves: Scratch, Pounce, Quick Dash, Charm, Agile Leap, Fancy Swipe
Animals.description: A nimble and curious companion, the domestic cat uses its sharp senses to detect threats and hidden resources. Though small, it’s agile, stealthy, and fiercely protective when cornered.

Animals.name: Siamese Cat
Animals.moves: Scratch, Pounce, Hypnotic Gaze, Quick Dash, Agile Leap, Charm
Animals.description: A nimble and curious companion, the domestic cat uses its sharp senses to detect threats and hidden resources. Though small, it’s agile, stealthy, and fiercely protective when cornered.

Animals.name: Tortoiseshell Cat
Animals.moves: Scratch, Pounce, Hiss, Playful Swipe, Agile Leap, Fury Swipes
Animals.description: A nimble and curious companion, the domestic cat uses its sharp senses to detect threats and hidden resources. Though small, it’s agile, stealthy, and fiercely protective when cornered.

Animals.name: House Crow
Animals.moves: Peck, Scratch, Quick Dash, Caw, Feather Toss, Ambush Strike
Animals.description: The house crow is a medium-sized, intelligent bird native to South Asia, easily recognized by its black and grey plumage. It thrives in urban areas, often scavenging near humans and adapting well to city life.

Animals.name: Pariah Dog
Animals.moves: Bite, Quick Dash, Howl, Pounce, Agile Strike, Tail Whip
Animals.description: A loyal and protective companion, the domestic dog excels at guarding and tracking with its keen senses. Strong and courageous, it thrives in a pack and will defend its allies without hesitation.

Animals.name: Persian Cat
Animals.moves: Scratch, Pounce, Charm, Gentle Swipe, Tail Whip, Hypnotic Gaze
Animals.description: A nimble and curious companion, the domestic cat uses its sharp senses to detect threats and hidden resources. Though small, it’s agile, stealthy, and fiercely protective when cornered.

Animals.name: Maine Coon Cat
Animals.moves: Scratch, Pounce, Heavy Swipe, Quick Dash, Tail Whip, Playful Slam
Animals.description: A nimble and curious companion, the domestic cat uses its sharp senses to detect threats and hidden resources. Though small, it’s agile, stealthy, and fiercely protective when cornered.

Animals.name: Asian Pied Starling
Animals.moves: Peck, Quick Dash, Wing Flap, Taunt, Feather Toss, Agile Strike
Animals.description: A medium-sized, black-and-white bird native to South and Southeast Asia, social and often found in flocks.

Animals.name: Asian Glossy Starling
Animals.moves: Peck, Quick Dash, Wing Flap, Caw, Feather Toss, Agile Strike
Animals.description: A medium-sized, glossy black bird with iridescent feathers, native to Southeast Asia, social and often seen in flocks.

Animals.name: Alligator Snapping Turtle
Animals.moves: Bite, Tail Whip, Snap Strike, Camouflage, Drag, Shell Shield
Animals.description: A massive freshwater turtle with a prehistoric appearance, using its powerful jaws and camouflaged body to ambush prey.

Animals.name: Sidewinder
Animals.moves: Bite, Venom Strike, Coil, Quick Dash, Ambush, Tail Whip
Animals.description: A small desert rattlesnake known for its unique sideways movement across sand and potent venom.

Animals.name: Iberian Solifuge
Animals.moves: Bite, Claw Slash, Quick Dash, Ambush, Pounce, Venomless Strike
Animals.description: A fast, predatory arachnid found in Iberian deserts, known for its speed and powerful chelicerae.

Animals.name: Black Heron
Animals.moves: Peck, Wing Slash, Quick Dash, Fishing Strike, Stomp, Agile Leap
Animals.description: A wading bird native to Africa, famous for using its wings like an umbrella to catch fish efficiently.

Animals.name: Thorny Devil
Animals.moves: Spiny Charge, Bite, Tail Whip, Camouflage, Sand Roll, Ambush Strike
Animals.description: A small Australian lizard covered in sharp spines, highly resilient and capable of absorbing water from its environment.

Animals.name: Mexican Plateau Horned Lizard
Animals.moves: Spiny Charge, Bite, Tail Whip, Camouflage, Sand Roll, Ambush Strike
Animals.description: A small, heavily spined lizard native to Mexico’s plateau regions, using its armor-like body to survive predators.

Animals.name: Giant Ground Pangolin
Animals.moves: Tail Strike, Claw Swipe, Roll Defense, Burrow, Ambush, Bite
Animals.description: A large, nocturnal pangolin with tough scales, capable of curling into a protective ball when threatened.

Animals.name: Nile Crocodile
Animals.moves: Bite, Tail Whip, Ambush Strike, Death Roll, Drag Under, Camouflage
Animals.description: One of the largest and most powerful crocodiles in the world, a top predator of African rivers with unmatched ambush strength.

Animals.name: Red-shouldered Hawk
Animals.moves: Peck, Talon Strike, Aerial Dive, Wing Slash, Agile Flight, Hunting Cry
Animals.description: A medium-sized hawk native to North America, recognized by its reddish shoulders and piercing hunting calls.

Animals.name: Saltwater Crocodile
Animals.moves: Bite, Tail Whip, Ambush Strike, Death Roll, Drag Under, Territorial Roar
Animals.description: The largest living reptile, the saltwater crocodile dominates rivers, estuaries, and coastal seas with unmatched power.

Animals.name: Wild Water Buffalo
Animals.moves: Horn Gore, Stomp, Charge, Tail Whip, Roar, Mud Roll
Animals.description: A massive, endangered wild bovine native to South and Southeast Asia, powerful and aggressive when threatened.

Animals.name: Alligator Gar
Animals.moves: Bite, Tail Whip, Ambush Strike, Drag Under, Scale Armor, Quick Lunge
Animals.description: A massive, prehistoric-looking fish with an alligator-like snout, found in North America’s rivers and lakes.

Animals.name: Arapaima
Animals.moves: Bite, Tail Slam, Quick Lunge, Drag Under, Scale Armor, Water Surge
Animals.description: One of the largest freshwater fish in the world, the arapaima is a powerful Amazonian predator capable of breathing air.

Animals.name: Nile Perch
Animals.moves: Bite, Tail Slam, Quick Lunge, Ambush Strike, Water Surge, Drag Under
Animals.description: A massive predatory freshwater fish from Africa, feared for its ferocity and appetite, capable of dominating its ecosystem.

Animals.name: Giant Snakehead
Animals.moves: Fang Bite, Surface Leap, Frenzied Strike, Lurk & Ambush, Thrash, Water Pursuit
Animals.description: An aggressive and territorial freshwater predator from Southeast Asia, feared for its power, stamina, and ability to breathe air and survive on land for short periods.

Animals.name: Giant Water Bug
Animals.moves: Ambush Lunge, Proboscis Drain, Toxic Saliva, Grasp & Hold, Aquatic Camouflage
Animals.description: A large aquatic insect known as “toe-biter,” it lurks underwater to ambush prey, injecting enzymes to liquefy insides for feeding.

Animals.name: Cottonmouth
Animals.moves: Venom Fang, Water Glide, Coil & Constrict, Ambush Bite, Threat Display
Animals.description: A semi-aquatic pit viper of the southeastern U.S., notorious for its white “cotton” mouth display and potent venom.

Animals.name: Black Jansen's Ratsnake
Animals.moves: Constrict, Quick Strike, Ambush, Coil, Tail Whip, Camouflage
Animals.description: A non-venomous snake from Southeast Asia, sleek and agile, relying on stealth and constriction to subdue prey.

Animals.name: Nine-banded Armadillo
Animals.moves: Tail Strike, Claw Swipe, Roll Defense, Burrow, Quick Dash, Ambush Strike
Animals.description: A small to medium-sized armored mammal native to the Americas, using its tough shell for protection and digging to evade threats.

Animals.name: Red Fox
Animals.moves: Bite, Pounce, Quick Dash, Tail Whip, Ambush Strike, Agile Leap
Animals.description: A highly adaptable canid found across the Northern Hemisphere, known for its intelligence, stealth, and resourcefulness.

Animals.name: Grizzly Bear
Animals.moves: Claw Swipe, Bite, Stomp, Charge, Roar, Ambush Strike
Animals.description: A massive North American bear, extremely strong and territorial, capable of overpowering most animals it encounters.

Animals.name: Star-nosed mole
Animals.moves: Dig, Quick Dash, Claw Swipe, Burrow, Ambush, Nose Probe
Animals.description: A small North American mole with a unique star-shaped nose, highly sensitive and adapted to detecting prey underground.

Animals.name: Orca
Animals.moves: Bite, Tail Slam, Sonic Blast, Ambush Strike, Water Surge, Pod Coordination
Animals.description: A powerful apex predator of the oceans, highly intelligent and capable of hunting large prey in coordinated groups.

Animals.name: Spotted Hyena
Animals.moves: Bite, Pounce, Stomp, Quick Dash, Ambush Strike, Howl
Animals.description: A highly social carnivore of African savannas, known for its endurance, powerful jaws, and coordinated hunting strategies.

Animals.name: Meerkat
Animals.moves: Bite, Quick Dash, Pounce, Sand Dig, Tail Whip, Alarm Call
Animals.description: A small, social mongoose-like mammal of the African deserts, famous for standing guard and working in highly cooperative groups.

Animals.name: Humpback Whale
Animals.moves: Tail Slam, Bite, Water Surge, Sonic Boom, Breach, Pod Coordination
Animals.description: A massive baleen whale known for its acrobatics and complex songs, inhabiting oceans worldwide and traveling in pods.

Animals.name: Giant Oarfish
Animals.moves: Whip Strike, Tail Slam, Quick Lunge, Camouflage, Drag Under, Water Surge
Animals.description: A long, ribbon-like deep-sea fish, rarely seen near the surface, capable of ambushing prey with its massive body.

Animals.name: Southern Giraffe
Animals.moves: Neck Strike, Kick, Quick Dash, Graze, Stomp, Tail Whip
Animals.description: A tall African herbivore with distinctive spots, using its long neck for feeding and powerful kicks to defend against predators.

Animals.name: African bush elephant
Animals.moves: Tusk Gore, Stomp, Trample, Charge, Ear Flap, Tail Whip
Animals.description: The largest land mammal on Earth, extremely strong and resilient, using its tusks, size, and weight to dominate threats.

Animals.name: African cape buffalo
Animals.moves: Horn Gore, Stomp, Charge, Tail Whip, Roar, Mud Roll
Animals.description: A massive and powerful African bovine, highly social and known for its unpredictable aggression when threatened.

Animals.name: Termite
Animals.moves: Bite, Swarm Attack, Pheromone Signal, Quick Dash, Burrow
Animals.description: A tiny social insect that lives in large colonies, feeding on wood and plant material, highly effective in numbers.

Animals.name: Atlantic bluefin tuna
Animals.moves: Tail Slam, Quick Lunge, Water Surge, Ambush Strike, Sonic Swim, Scale Armor
Animals.description: A massive, fast-swimming predatory fish of the Atlantic, highly prized and capable of long migrations.

Animals.name: Giant Grouper
Animals.moves: Bite, Tail Slam, Quick Lunge, Water Surge, Drag Under, Camouflage
Animals.description: One of the largest bony fish in the world, a slow but powerful reef predator capable of swallowing large prey whole.

Animals.name: Atlantic Goliath Grouper
Animals.moves: Bite, Tail Slam, Quick Lunge, Water Surge, Drag Under, Camouflage
Animals.description: A massive reef-dwelling fish of the Atlantic, slow but extremely powerful, capable of swallowing large prey whole.

Animals.name: Amazonian manatee
Animals.moves: Tail Slam, Water Glide, Graze, Rest, Mud Cloud, Body Block
Animals.description: A peaceful herbivorous marine mammal of the Amazon Basin, feeding on aquatic plants and using its bulk to deter predators.

Animals.name: West Indian Manatee
Animals.moves: Tail Slam, Water Glide, Graze, Rest, Mud Cloud, Body Block
Animals.description: A slow-moving herbivorous marine mammal found in the Caribbean and Gulf of Mexico, gentle yet resilient against most predators.

Animals.name: African Manatee
Animals.moves: Tail Slam, Water Glide, Graze, Rest, Mud Cloud, Body Block
Animals.description: A gentle herbivore of West and Central African rivers and coasts, often living in secluded wetlands and mangrove areas.

Animals.name: Leatherback Sea Turtle
Animals.moves: Shell Bash, Tail Strike, Water Glide, Dive, Body Block, Flipper Slam
Animals.description: The largest sea turtle species, armored with a leathery shell, capable of migrating thousands of kilometers across oceans.

Animals.name: Mata Mata Turtle
Animals.moves: Bite, Camouflage, Shell Bash, Water Ambush, Tail Strike, Hold Breath
Animals.description: A strange-looking freshwater turtle from the Amazon, perfectly camouflaged among leaf litter and skilled at ambush hunting.

Animals.name: Burmese Python
Animals.moves: Constrict, Bite, Coil, Ambush, Tail Whip, Camouflage
Animals.description: ne of the world’s largest snakes, capable of overpowering large prey with sheer strength and crushing coils.

Animals.name: Florida Green Water Snake
Animals.moves: Bite, Quick Strike, Water Glide, Ambush, Coil, Tail Whip
Animals.description: A large, non-venomous snake native to the southeastern U.S., thriving in wetlands and feeding mostly on fish and amphibians.

Animals.name: Black Mountain Skink
Animals.moves: Bite, Tail Whip, Quick Dash, Claw Scratch, Camouflage, Rock Hide
Animals.description: A rare, rock-dwelling skink from Australia, dark in color and well-adapted to hiding in crevices to avoid predators.

Animals.name: Green Anaconda
Animals.moves: Constrict, Water Ambush, Tail Slam, Bite, Coil Trap, Drown Grip
Animals.description: The heaviest snake in the world, the green anaconda thrives in swamps and rivers of South America, ambushing prey with sheer strength.

Animals.name: Crocodile Monitor
Animals.moves: Tail Whip, Ambush Bite, Tree Lunge, Claw Slash, Grapple Hold, Escape Climb
Animals.description: Native to Papua New Guinea, the crocodile monitor is one of the longest lizards in the world, armed with sharp claws, a powerful tail, and teeth designed to slice.

Animals.name: Tarantula Hawk
Animals.moves: Sting, Aerial Strike, Swift Dash, Ambush, Wing Slash, Venom Injection
Animals.description: A large wasp that hunts tarantulas, known for its extremely painful sting and impressive aerial agility.

Animals.name: Yellow Jacket Wasp
Animals.moves: Sting, Quick Dash, Wing Slash, Ambush, Bite, Poison Spray
Animals.description: A small but aggressive social wasp, capable of delivering painful stings and attacking in coordinated swarms.

Animals.name: Short-Beaked Echidna
Animals.moves: Spine Roll, Dig, Claw Swipe, Tail Whip, Burrow, Quick Dash
Animals.description: A small, egg-laying mammal from Australia with sharp spines for protection and a specialized tongue for catching ants and termites.

Animals.name: Eastern Long-Beaked Echidna
Animals.moves: Spine Roll, Dig, Claw Swipe, Burrow, Tail Whip, Quick Strike
Animals.description: A rare, long-beaked echidna from New Guinea, feeding on worms and insects, protected by sharp spines and a burrowing lifestyle.

Animals.name: Whitemouth Moray
Animals.moves: Bite, Coil Strike, Quick Lunge, Camouflage, Tail Whip, Water Surge
Animals.description: A medium-sized moray eel found in Indo-Pacific reefs, striking swiftly from hidden spots to catch unsuspecting prey.

Animals.name: Freshwater Moray
Animals.moves: Bite, Coil Strike, Quick Lunge, Camouflage, Tail Whip, Water Surge
Animals.description: A rare moray eel that can thrive in freshwater rivers and estuaries of Southeast Asia, striking swiftly from hidden nooks.

Animals.name: Red Devil Vampire Crab
Animals.moves: Claw Strike, Ambush Pinch, Quick Dash, Burrow, Grapple, Camouflage
Animals.description: A small, brightly colored freshwater crab from Southeast Asia, known for its aggressive behavior and striking red coloration.

Animals.name: Coconut Crab
Animals.moves: Claw Strike, Coconut Slam, Quick Dash, Burrow, Grapple, Tail Whip
Animals.description: The largest terrestrial arthropod in the world, capable of climbing trees and cracking coconuts with its powerful claws.

Animals.name: Zebra Mantis Shrimp
Animals.moves: Smash Punch, Quick Dash, Burrow, Claw Strike, Ambush, Tail Flick
Animals.description: A brightly patterned mantis shrimp known for its lightning-fast strikes capable of stunning or breaking shells of prey.

Animals.name: Peacock Mantis Shrimp
Animals.moves: Hammer Strike, Rapid Jab, Burrow, Color Flash, Shell Crush, Tail Flick
Animals.description: A vibrantly colored mantis shrimp known for its lightning-fast and extremely strong strikes, capable of breaking shells and stunning opponents.

Animals.name: West Indian Ocean Coelacanth
Animals.moves: Tail Slam, Ambush, Slow Swim, Hard Scale, Lunge, Camouflage
Animals.description: A living fossil fish with armored scales and a slow, deliberate movement, capable of ambushing prey and enduring attacks.

Animals.name: Peregrine Falcon
Animals.moves: Talon Strike, Dive Bomb, Quick Wing, Aerial Ambush, Sharp Beak, Wind Slash
Animals.description: The fastest bird in the world, capable of diving at incredible speeds to strike prey with precision and deadly force.

Animals.name: Golden Eagle
Animals.moves: Talon Crush, Sky Dive, Wing Buffet, Aerial Ambush, Sharp Beak, Wind Gust
Animals.description: A powerful raptor with incredible vision and strength, known for soaring over mountains and swooping down on prey with unmatched precision.

Animals.name: Bald Eagle
Animals.moves: Talon Slash, Dive Strike, Wing Gust, Fish Snatch, Aerial Ambush, Sharp Beak
Animals.description: A majestic bird of prey and national symbol, the Bald Eagle is skilled at hunting fish and soaring over wide open waters.

Animals.name: Harpy Eagle
Animals.moves: Talon Crush, Aerial Ambush, Wing Slam, Grab & Drop, Sharp Beak, Wind Gust
Animals.description: One of the largest and most powerful eagles, the Harpy Eagle rules the rainforest canopy, using immense talons to seize prey as large as monkeys and sloths.

Animals.name: Red-tailed Hawk
Animals.moves: Talon Strike, Dive Slash, Wing Buffet, Aerial Ambush, Sharp Beak, Wind Gust
Animals.description: A widespread and adaptable raptor with a piercing scream, the Red-tailed Hawk uses its sharp vision and powerful dive to catch prey in open landscapes.

Animals.name: Snowy Owl
Animals.moves: Talon Slash, Wing Buffet, Silent Glide, Frost Ambush, Sharp Beak, Wind Gust
Animals.description: A large white owl adapted to cold climates, the Snowy Owl uses its silent wings and sharp talons to ambush prey across the tundra and icy plains.

Animals.name: Great Blue Heron
Animals.moves: Beak Stab, Wing Buffet, Quick Step, Fish Snatch, Ambush, Wind Gust
Animals.description: A tall and graceful wading bird, the Great Blue Heron hunts fish and amphibians with precision strikes from its long, spear-like beak.

Animals.name: Greater Flamingo
Animals.moves: Beak Sweep, Leg Kick, Wing Flap, Water Jab, Peck, Quick Step
Animals.description: A tall, pink wading bird that feeds by filtering water, using its long legs and beak to navigate shallow waters and maintain balance while defending itself.

Animals.name: Brown Pelican
Animals.moves: Beak Sweep, Leg Kick, Wing Flap, Water Jab, Peck, Quick Step
Animals.description: A coastal bird known for its spectacular plunging dives to catch fish, using its large beak pouch to scoop prey efficiently.

Animals.name: Mallard Duck
Animals.moves: Beak Peck, Wing Flap, Quick Swim, Splash, Ambush, Leg Kick
Animals.description: A common duck found near lakes and rivers, skilled at swimming, diving for food, and evading predators with quick movements.

Animals.name: Great White Pelican
Animals.moves: Beak Slam, Wing Flap, Quick Dive, Fish Snatch, Splash, Ambush
Animals.description: A large wading bird with a massive beak pouch, the Great White Pelican scoops fish from shallow waters with precision and teamwork.

Animals.name: Mute Swan
Animals.moves: Beak Peck, Wing Flap, Neck Strike, Splash, Ambush, Quick Step
Animals.description: A large and elegant waterfowl, the Mute Swan uses its strong wings and long neck to defend territory and catch small prey in lakes and rivers.

Animals.name: Eurasian Eagle-Owl
Animals.moves: Talon Slash, Wing Buffet, Silent Glide, Ambush, Sharp Beak, Wind Gust
Animals.description: One of the largest owls in the world, the Eurasian Eagle-Owl uses its massive talons, silent flight, and keen vision to hunt a variety of prey at night.

Animals.name: Blue Jay
Animals.moves: Beak Peck, Wing Flap, Quick Dash, Ambush, Tail Strike, Loud Call
Animals.description: A clever and noisy bird, the Blue Jay uses its intelligence and loud calls to confuse predators and defend its territory.

Animals.name: Northern Cardinal
Animals.moves: Beak Peck, Wing Flap, Quick Dash, Ambush, Tail Strike, Loud Call
Animals.description: A bright red songbird known for its melodious calls and quick movements, often using agility to evade predators.

Animals.name: Eurasian Magpie
Animals.moves: Beak Peck, Wing Flap, Quick Dash, Ambush, Tail Strike, Loud Call
Animals.description: A highly intelligent and adaptable bird, the Eurasian Magpie uses its cleverness to gather food, evade predators, and sometimes play tricks on other creatures.

Animals.name: Common Raven
Animals.moves: Beak Peck, Wing Flap, Quick Dash, Ambush, Tail Strike, Loud Call
Animals.description: A large and intelligent bird, the Common Raven uses strategy and adaptability to hunt, scavenge, and evade threats across varied environments.

Animals.name: Great Spotted Woodpecker
Animals.moves: Beak Peck, Wood Tap, Wing Flap, Quick Dash, Tail Strike, Ambush
Animals.description: A clever and agile woodpecker that drills into tree trunks to find insects, using its sharp beak to strike and sometimes stun its prey.

Animals.name: Common Blackbird
Animals.moves: Beak Peck, Wing Flap, Quick Dash, Ambush, Tail Strike, Loud Call
Animals.description: A widespread and adaptable songbird, the Common Blackbird uses its quick movements and melodious song to defend territory and evade predators.

Animals.name: Red-whiskered Bulbul
Animals.moves: Beak Peck, Wing Flap, Quick Dash, Ambush, Tail Strike, Loud Call
Animals.description: A small and active bird with distinctive red markings, the Red-whiskered Bulbul uses its alertness and quick movements to escape predators and signal danger.

Animals.name: Scarlet Macaw
Animals.moves: Beak Peck, Wing Flap, Quick Dash, Ambush, Tail Strike, Loud Call
Animals.description: A large and vividly colored parrot of the rainforest, the Scarlet Macaw uses its bright plumage and agility to evade predators and interact socially.

Animals.name: White-throated Toucan
Animals.moves: Beak Peck, Wing Flap, Quick Dash, Ambush, Tail Strike, Loud Call
Animals.description: A large tropical bird with a colorful and oversized beak, the White-throated Toucan uses its beak to reach fruit, scare predators, and playfully interact with others.

Animals.name: Andean Cock-of-the-Rock
Animals.moves: Beak Peck, Wing Flap, Quick Dash, Ambush, Tail Strike, Loud Call
Animals.description: A striking bird of the Andes known for its brilliant red plumage and elaborate mating displays, using its colors and agility to dazzle and evade threats.

Animals.name: Guianan Cock-of-the-Rock
Animals.moves: Beak Peck, Wing Flap, Quick Dash, Ambush, Tail Strike, Loud Call
Animals.description: A vibrant orange bird of the Guiana Shield, famous for its colorful courtship dances and agility in forest canopies, using its display to confuse predators and rivals.

Animals.name: Bullet Ant
Animals.moves: Sting, Bite, Quick Dash, Ambush, Claw Pinch, Mandible Slam
Animals.description: Known for having one of the most painful stings in the insect world, the Bullet Ant uses speed and powerful stings to defend itself and attack prey.

Animals.name: Glasswing Butterfly
Animals.moves: Wing Flap, Quick Dash, Dust Scatter, Ambush, Light Glide, Tail Flick
Animals.description: A delicate butterfly with transparent wings, the Glasswing uses stealth and speed to avoid predators while fluttering gracefully through its habitat.

Animals.name: Cotton-top Tamarin
Animals.moves: Bite, Scratch, Quick Dash, Ambush, Tail Grab, Throw Object
Animals.description: A small and energetic primate with striking white hair, the Cotton-top Tamarin uses speed and agility to forage, evade predators, and play within its social groups.

Animals.name: Emperor Tamarin
Animals.moves: Bite, Scratch, Quick Dash, Ambush, Tail Grab, Throw Object
Animals.description: A small primate known for its distinctive long mustache, the Emperor Tamarin uses agility and clever tricks to forage, evade predators, and interact socially.

Animals.name: Black Lion Tamarin
Animals.moves: Bite, Scratch, Quick Dash, Ambush, Tail Grab, Throw Object
Animals.description: A small and agile primate with striking black fur, the Black Lion Tamarin uses speed and stealth to move through dense forests, forage, and avoid predators.

Animals.name: Madagascar Hissing Cockroach
Animals.moves: Bite, Hiss, Quick Crawl, Ambush, Shell Guard, Leg Kick
Animals.description: A large cockroach native to Madagascar, famous for its defensive hissing sound and durable exoskeleton, making it a resilient survivor.

Animals.name: Dubia Roach
Animals.moves: Bite, Quick Crawl, Ambush, Shell Guard, Leg Kick, Hide
Animals.description: A durable and slow-moving roach often used as feeder insect, the Dubia Roach relies on its tough shell and survival instincts to endure predators.

Animals.name: African Grey Parrot
Animals.moves: Peck, Wing Flap, Mimic, Quick Escape, Loud Call, Feather Shield
Animals.description: Known for its extraordinary intelligence and mimicry, the African Grey Parrot is one of the smartest birds, able to learn sounds and solve puzzles.

Animals.name: Viper Dogfish
Animals.moves: Bite, Deep Slash, Quick Lunge, Dark Waters, Pressure Bite, Lurk
Animals.description: A rare deep-sea shark with long needle-like teeth that extend outward, allowing it to snatch prey in the pitch-black depths.

Animals.name: Giant Isopod
Animals.moves: Roll Up, Clamp, Burrow, Heavy Press, Deep Rest, Shell Guard
Animals.description: A massive deep-sea isopod with armored plates that protect it from predators. It spends most of its time scavenging in the darkness of the ocean floor.

Animals.name: Barreleye Fish
Animals.moves: Clear Sight, Glide, Shadow Dodge, Deep Drift, Focused Strike, Illuminate
Animals.description: A strange deep-sea fish with a transparent head that reveals its upward-facing tubular eyes, allowing it to track prey in the pitch-black depths.

Animals.name: Indian Peafowl
Animals.moves: Feather Dance, Peck, Quick Step, Tail Fan, Distract, Call Cry
Animals.description: A striking bird with a long, iridescent tail used in courtship and intimidation displays. Its vibrant colors can confuse predators and rivals alike.

Animals.name: Eastern Yellow-billed Hornbill
Animals.moves: Beak Peck, Wing Flap, Quick Dash, Tail Strike, Ambush, Loud Call
Animals.description: A medium-sized hornbill native to East Africa, known for its long yellow bill, agility in trees and on the ground, and loud calls to communicate with its group.

Animals.name: Great Hornbill
Animals.moves: Beak Peck, Wing Flap, Quick Dash, Tail Strike, Ambush, Loud Call
Animals.description: A massive and striking bird of Southeast Asia, the Great Hornbill uses its enormous beak and wingspan to forage, defend territory, and intimidate rivals.

Animals.name: Common Myna
Animals.moves: Beak Peck, Wing Flap, Quick Dash, Ambush, Tail Strike, Loud Call
Animals.description: A highly adaptable bird native to South and Southeast Asia, the Common Myna is known for its intelligence, vocal mimicry, and ability to thrive in open forests and grasslands.

Animals.name: Buffy Fish Owl
Animals.moves: Talon Slash, Wing Buffet, Silent Glide, Ambush, Sharp Beak, Water Snatch
Animals.description: A medium-sized owl native to Southeast Asia, specialized in hunting fish along rivers and wetlands with its sharp talons and keen eyesight.

Animals.name: Long-tailed Tit
Animals.moves: Beak Peck, Wing Flap, Quick Dash, Ambush, Tail Strike, Loud Call
Animals.description: A tiny and agile songbird found across Europe and Asia, the Long-tailed Tit uses speed, teamwork, and acrobatics to forage and avoid predators.

Animals.name: Brown Hawk-Owl
Animals.moves: Talon Slash, Wing Buffet, Silent Glide, Ambush, Sharp Beak, Quick Dash
Animals.description: A nocturnal owl found across South and Southeast Asia, the Brown Hawk-Owl uses stealth and sharp talons to catch small mammals and insects during the night.

Animals.name: Common Ostrich
Animals.moves: Kick, Peck, Sprint, Dust Flap, Tail Sweep, Stomp
Animals.description: The largest living bird, native to African savannas, the Common Ostrich uses its immense size, speed, and powerful legs to defend itself and escape predators.

Animals.name: Red-billed Buffalo Weaver
Animals.moves: Beak Peck, Wing Flap, Quick Dash, Tail Strike, Ambush, Loud Call
Animals.description: A social bird native to African savannas, the Red-billed Buffalo Weaver builds large communal nests and uses its numbers and calls to ward off predators.

Animals.name: White-backed Vulture
Animals.moves: Talon Slash, Wing Buffet, Dive Bomb, Ambush, Sharp Beak, Wind Gust
Animals.description: A large African vulture that feeds primarily on carrion, using keen eyesight to spot weakened prey and dominate carcasses.

Animals.name: Cougar
Animals.moves: Pounce, Claw Strike, Bite, Quick Dash, Ambush, Tail Whip
Animals.description: A large, solitary feline native to the Americas, the Cougar uses stealth, strength, and agility to hunt a variety of prey across forests, mountains, and grasslands.

Animals.name: California Condor
Animals.moves: Talon Slash, Wing Buffet, Dive Bomb, Ambush, Sharp Beak, Wind Gust
Animals.description: A massive North American vulture that soars over mountains and canyons, feeding primarily on carrion while using keen eyesight to locate carcasses.

Animals.name: Collared Peccary
Animals.moves: Tusks Jab, Bite, Quick Dash, Ambush, Trample, Tail Whip
Animals.description: A small wild pig native to the Americas, the Collared Peccary moves in herds, using its tusks and group tactics to defend against predators and forage for food.

Animals.name: Mule Deer
Animals.moves: Antler Strike, Kick, Quick Dash, Charge, Ambush, Tail Whip
Animals.description: A medium-sized deer native to western North America, the Mule Deer uses speed and agility to escape predators while foraging in forests, grasslands, and mountains.

Animals.name: Chinese Gliding Tree Frog
Animals.moves: Tongue Lash, Leap Strike, Quick Dash, Ambush, Claw Grab, Tail Flick
Animals.description: A large arboreal frog native to China, known for its webbed feet that allow it to glide between trees, making it an agile predator in forest canopies.

Animals.name: Great Basin Rattlesnake
Animals.moves: Bite, Rattle Warning, Coil Strike, Ambush, Quick Lunge, Tail Whip
Animals.description: A venomous pit viper native to the western United States, the Great Basin Rattlesnake uses stealth and its venomous bite to hunt small mammals and defend itself.

Animals.name: Gila Monster
Animals.moves: Bite, Tail Whip, Ambush, Slow Crawl, Claw Strike, Burrow
Animals.description: A heavy-bodied lizard native to the deserts of the southwestern United States and northern Mexico, the Gila Monster uses its venomous bite and tough skin to defend itself and catch prey.

Animals.name: California Desert Tortoise
Animals.moves: Bite, Shell Ram, Burrow, Slow Crawl, Tail Whip, Ambush
Animals.description: A slow-moving tortoise native to the deserts of the southwestern United States, the California Desert Tortoise relies on its tough shell and burrowing habits to survive harsh environments and predators.

Animals.name: Coyote
Animals.moves: Bite, Claw Strike, Quick Dash, Ambush, Howl, Tail Whip
Animals.description: A versatile and intelligent canid native to North and Central America, the Coyote uses speed, cunning, and cooperative hunting strategies to survive in diverse habitats.

Animals.name: Kaibab Squirrel
Animals.moves: Bite, Scratch, Quick Dash, Ambush, Tail Whip, Nut Toss
Animals.description: A tree squirrel endemic to the Kaibab Plateau in Arizona, the Kaibab Squirrel uses its agility and climbing skills to navigate pine forests and forage for seeds.

Animals.name: Mexican Beaded Lizard
Animals.moves: Bite, Tail Whip, Ambush, Slow Crawl, Claw Strike, Burrow
Animals.description: A heavy-bodied, venomous lizard native to Mexico’s deserts and scrublands, the Mexican Beaded Lizard uses its tough skin and venomous bite to catch prey and defend itself.

Animals.name: Rio Fuerte Beaded Lizard
Animals.moves: Bite, Tail Whip, Ambush, Slow Crawl, Claw Strike, Burrow
Animals.description: A venomous lizard native to northwestern Mexico, the Rio Fuerte Beaded Lizard uses its heavy body, tough skin, and venomous bite to hunt small animals and defend itself in desert and scrub habitats.

Animals.name: Guatemalan Beaded Lizard
Animals.moves: Bite, Tail Whip, Ambush, Slow Crawl, Claw Strike, Burrow
Animals.description: A critically endangered venomous lizard native to the dry forests of Guatemala, the Guatemalan Beaded Lizard uses its robust body, armored skin, and venom to hunt small prey and defend itself.

Animals.name: Chiapan Beaded Lizard
Animals.moves: Bite, Tail Whip, Ambush, Slow Crawl, Claw Strike, Burrow
Animals.description: A venomous lizard native to the mountainous and semi-arid regions of Chiapas, Mexico, the Chiapan Beaded Lizard relies on its tough skin and venomous bite to capture prey and defend itself.

Animals.name: Payara
Animals.moves: Fang Bite, Quick Dash, Ambush, Tail Flick, River Surge, Lunge
Animals.description: Known as the "vampire fish," the Payara is a predatory freshwater fish from South America with long dagger-like fangs that can pierce through prey in fast-flowing rivers.

Animals.name: Tiger Shovelnose Catfish
Animals.moves: Whisker Sense, Tail Flick, River Surge, Ambush, Bite, Deep Lunge
Animals.description: A large predatory catfish native to the Amazon Basin, the Tiger Shovelnose Catfish uses its elongated snout and whiskers to detect prey in murky waters, striking with speed and power.

Animals.name: Straightline Dragonfish
Animals.moves: Fang Bite, Deep Lunge, Ambush, Dark Waters, Illuminate, Tail Flick
Animals.description: A deep-sea predator with long, needle-like fangs and light-producing organs, the Straightline Dragonfish uses its lure to attract prey in the pitch-black ocean depths.

Animals.name: Spearfish Remora
Animals.moves: Attach, Quick Bite, Slipstream, Swim Dash, Leech Guard, Detach
Animals.description: A slender remora that lives by attaching itself to marlins, spearfish, and other large ocean predators. It feeds on scraps and gains protection by hitching rides.

Animals.name: Slender Suckerfish
Animals.moves: Attach, Nibble, Swim Dash, Leech Guard, Slipstream, Detach
Animals.description: A sleek remora species known for traveling with large marine animals and sometimes boats. It feeds on parasites and scraps from its host while conserving energy.

Animals.name: White Sucker
Animals.moves: Bottom Sweep, Silt Cloud, Scale Armor, Mud Hide, River Drift, Feeding Frenzy
Animals.description: A freshwater fish with a cylindrical body and sucker-like mouth adapted for bottom feeding. It is important for nutrient cycling in rivers and lakes.

Animals.name: Black Ghostshark
Animals.moves: Shadow Drift, Pressure Bite, Abyssal Current, Tail Whip, Dark Glide, Sonar Sense
Animals.description: A deep-sea chimaera related to sharks but distinct in lineage. It has smooth, dark skin, large eyes adapted to the deep, and a long whip-like tail. Despite its ghostly name, it is a real and rarely seen species.

Animals.name: American Elephant Fish
Animals.moves: Static Pulse, Mud Dash, Tail Strike, Electric Drift, Quick Current, Sensory Scan
Animals.description: A freshwater fish with an elongated trunk-like mouth resembling an elephant’s trunk. It uses this organ for probing the riverbed in search of invertebrates. Its weak bioelectric field gives it an uncanny awareness of its surroundings, even in complete darkness.

Animals.name: Australian Lungfish
Animals.moves: Air Gulp, Tail Sweep, Scale Guard, Bottom Rest, River Surge, Ancient Pulse
Animals.description: One of the oldest living lineages of fish, the Australian Lungfish is a slow-moving, air-breathing freshwater giant. It uses a single lung to survive in stagnant waters where most fish would suffocate.

Animals.name: American Paddlefish
Animals.moves: Paddle Slam, Current Glide, Scale Guard, Plankton Filter, River Surge, Tail Sweep
Animals.description: A large freshwater fish with a long, paddle-shaped snout used to sense plankton in murky rivers. Known as a living fossil, it glides gracefully through waterways while filtering massive amounts of microscopic prey.

Animals.name: Chinese Paddlefish
Animals.moves: Paddle Slam, Current Glide, Tail Sweep, Ambush, River Surge, Plankton Filter
Animals.description: Once one of the largest freshwater fish in the world, native to the Yangtze River, the Chinese Paddlefish had a long paddle-like snout used to sense prey. Now extinct, it is remembered as a giant of its river ecosystem.

Animals.name: Bonefish
Animals.moves: Quick Dash, Tail Flick, Ambush, Scale Guard, Shallow Strike, Glide
Animals.description: A fast and silvery fish found in tropical and subtropical coastal waters. Bonefish are known for their speed and agility, making them challenging prey for predators and popular among anglers.

Animals.name: Freshwater Angelfish
Animals.moves: Quick Dash, Tail Flick, Ambush, Fin Strike, Scale Guard, Glide
Animals.description: A tall, laterally compressed tropical freshwater fish native to slow-moving rivers in the Amazon Basin. Its striking shape and colors help it blend into aquatic plants while hunting small prey.

Animals.name: Pacific Viperfish
Animals.moves: Fang Bite, Deep Lunge, Ambush, Dark Waters, Illuminate, Tail Flick
Animals.description: A fearsome deep-sea predator with large fang-like teeth and light-producing organs. Native to the Pacific Ocean, it hunts smaller fish in the pitch-black depths using stealth and its glowing lure.

Animals.name: Roosterfish
Animals.moves: Tail Whip, Quick Dash, Ambush, Fin Strike, Wave Surge, Jump Strike
Animals.description: A large, predatory coastal fish found in the eastern Pacific Ocean, famous for its distinctive dorsal fin resembling a rooster’s comb. It is an agile hunter in shallow waters.

Animals.name: Common Pleco
Animals.moves: Tail Sweep, Silt Cloud, Scale Guard, Mud Hide, Bottom Rest, Ambush
Animals.description: A freshwater catfish native to rivers in South America. It uses its sucker mouth to cling to surfaces, scrape algae, and avoid predators, making it a resilient bottom-dweller.

Animals.name: Blue Crane
Animals.moves: Peck, Wing Flap, Quick Dash, Tail Strike, Ambush, Loud Call
Animals.description: A tall and elegant bird native to southern Africa, especially grasslands and savannas. It uses its long legs and agility to forage, evade predators, and display courtship dances.

Animals.name: House Sparrow
Animals.moves: Peck, Quick Dash, Wing Flap, Tail Strike, Ambush, Loud Call
Animals.description: A small, adaptable bird native to Europe and Asia, now widespread worldwide. House Sparrows thrive in open areas, farmlands, and near human settlements.

Animals.name: Lanner Falcon
Animals.moves: Talon Slash, Quick Dash, Dive Bomb, Ambush, Wing Buffet, Sharp Beak
Animals.description: A medium-large falcon native to Africa and parts of southern Europe. Known for incredible speed and precision, it hunts birds and small mammals with swift aerial strikes.

Animals.name: Lilac-breasted Roller
Animals.moves: Beak Peck, Quick Dash, Wing Flap, Tail Strike, Ambush, Loud Call
Animals.description: A brightly colored bird native to sub-Saharan African savannas and open woodlands. Known for spectacular aerial displays and agile hunting of insects and small prey.

Animals.name: Superb Starling
Animals.moves: Peck, Quick Dash, Wing Flap, Tail Strike, Ambush, Loud Call
Animals.description: A small, colorful bird native to East Africa, often found in open savannas and near human settlements. Its iridescent feathers and social behavior make it highly noticeable and agile.

Animals.name: Tawny Eagle
Animals.moves: Talon Slash, Wing Buffet, Dive Bomb, Ambush, Sharp Beak, Quick Dash
Animals.description: A large bird of prey native to Africa and parts of Asia, the Tawny Eagle hunts small mammals and carrion, using keen eyesight and powerful talons.

Animals.name: White Stork
Animals.moves: Beak Peck, Wing Flap, Quick Dash, Tail Strike, Ambush, Loud Call
Animals.description: A large wading bird native to Europe, Africa, and western Asia, the White Stork hunts amphibians, insects, and small vertebrates while soaring gracefully over wetlands and fields.

Animals.name: Desert Sparrow
Animals.moves: Peck, Quick Dash, Wing Flap, Tail Strike, Ambush, Loud Call
Animals.description: A small sparrow native to North African and Middle Eastern deserts. Adapted to hot, arid environments, it forages for seeds and insects while avoiding extreme heat.

Animals.name: Desert Wheatear
Animals.moves: Peck, Quick Dash, Wing Flap, Tail Strike, Ambush, Loud Call
Animals.description: A small, agile passerine native to arid deserts of North Africa and Asia. The Desert Wheatear hunts insects on the ground and uses quick, darting movements to avoid predators.

Animals.name: European Bee-eater
Animals.moves: Beak Peck, Quick Dash, Wing Flap, Tail Strike, Ambush, Dive Bomb
Animals.description: A colorful migratory bird native to southern Europe, northern Africa, and western Asia. It hunts flying insects, especially bees and wasps, using agile flight and precise strikes.

Animals.name: Hemprich’s Hornbill
Animals.moves: Beak Peck, Wing Flap, Quick Dash, Tail Strike, Ambush, Loud Call
Animals.description: A medium-sized hornbill native to northeastern Africa and the Arabian Peninsula. It forages in savannas and open woodlands, feeding on fruits, insects, and small animals.

Animals.name: Natal Spurfowl
Animals.moves: Peck, Claw Strike, Quick Dash, Tail Strike, Ambush, Loud Call
Animals.description: A medium-sized ground-dwelling bird native to southern Africa. The Natal Spurfowl feeds on seeds, insects, and small invertebrates while foraging in savannas and open woodlands.

Animals.name: Sand Partridge
Animals.moves: Peck, Quick Dash, Sand Kick, Alert Call, Wing Flap, Scramble
Animals.description: A small, ground-dwelling bird found in deserts and arid regions of the Middle East and North Africa. It feeds on seeds and insects, blending seamlessly with its sandy surroundings.

Animals.name: Wedge-tailed Eagle
Animals.moves: Talon Slash, Wing Buffet, Dive Bomb, Soaring Strike, Sharp Beak, Quick Dash
Animals.description: Australia’s largest bird of prey, the Wedge-tailed Eagle soars high to hunt mammals, birds, and carrion. Its massive wingspan and powerful talons make it a dominant predator in its range.

Animals.name: Arctic Tern
Animals.moves: Dive Peck, Wing Slash, Swift Strike, Agile Glide, Alert Call, Quick Dash
Animals.description: A small seabird known for the longest migration of any animal, traveling from the Arctic to the Antarctic annually. It feeds on fish and small invertebrates, often catching prey mid-flight.

Animals.name: Atlantic Puffin
Animals.moves: Beak Peck, Wing Flap, Dive Catch, Rock Hop, Alert Call, Quick Dash
Animals.description: A colorful seabird of the North Atlantic, famous for its vibrant beak and skillful diving. Puffins feed mainly on small fish and nest in burrows on steep coastal cliffs.

Animals.name: Common Eider
Animals.moves: Beak Peck, Water Dive, Wing Flap, Shell Crush, Alert Call, Quick Swim
Animals.description: A large sea duck found in northern coastal regions, the Common Eider dives to catch mollusks and crustaceans. Its thick feathers provide excellent insulation in cold waters.

Animals.name: Common Loon
Animals.moves: Dive Peck, Water Slash, Wing Flap, Fish Grab, Alert Call, Quick Swim
Animals.description: A large aquatic bird of northern lakes and coastal waters, the Common Loon dives skillfully to catch fish. Its haunting calls are iconic of wilderness lakes.

Animals.name: Gyrfalcon
Animals.moves: Talon Slash, Dive Bomb, Wing Buffet, Swift Strike, Sharp Beak, Quick Dash
Animals.description: The largest falcon species, found in Arctic and sub-Arctic regions. The Gyrfalcon preys on birds and mammals, using incredible speed and precision in flight.

Animals.name: Long-tailed Jaeger
Animals.moves: Dive Peck, Wing Slash, Swift Strike, Harass, Agile Glide, Quick Dash
Animals.description: A migratory seabird of the Arctic tundra and open oceans. Known for chasing other birds to steal their catches, the Long-tailed Jaeger is agile and highly maneuverable in flight.

Animals.name: Snow Goose
Animals.moves: Peck, Wing Flap, Dive Peck, Quick Dash, Alert Call, Mud Forage
Animals.description: A migratory waterfowl of North America, the Snow Goose feeds on grasses, grains, and roots. It travels in large flocks, often covering thousands of kilometers between breeding and wintering grounds.
